description:
Unaired episode bundled with the ninth volume of the manga. The episode will follow the disciplinary committee as they form "The First Lost Property Detective Team" and set out to search for a student's missing keychain.

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

title: {'romaji': 'Biaoren', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Swordplay'}, {'name': 'Martial Arts'}, {'name': 'Gore'}, {'name': 'Wuxia'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'Historical'}]
description: ‘Escort’, refers to paid warriors, their targets of protection, are also referred to targets that are wanted by the government. On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples’ feelings of grudge and animosity develop…

title: {'romaji': 'Natsuiro Kiseki', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Coming of Age'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Magic'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Teen Cast'}, {'name': 'Cute Girls Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Idol'}, {'name': 'Time Manipulation'}, {'name': 'Iyashikei'}, {'name': 'Body Swapping'}, {'name': 'Tennis'}, {'name': 'School'}, {'name': 'Kuudere'}, {'name': 'Love Triangle'}, {'name': 'Tomboy'}, {'name': 'Tanned Skin'}, {'name': 'Ships'}, {'name': 'Witch'}]
description:
At a Shinto shrine in Shimoda, there is a large rock. It is said that if four close friends gather around the rock and all wish for the same thing, that wish will come true. As four friends, Natsumi, Saki, Yuka and Rinko, gather around the rock like they used to in their childhood, they soon find the rock can indeed grant people's wishes. With only a short amount of time before Saki is due to transfer schools, the girls spend a summer filled with magic.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: {'romaji': 'Vatican Kiseki Chousakan', 'english': 'Vatican Miracle Examiner'}
tags: [{'name': 'Foreign'}, {'name': 'Religion'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Nun'}, {'name': 'Drugs'}, {'name': 'Angels'}]
description:
Centering on Hiraga Josef Kou, a genius scientist, and Robert Nicholas, an archives and cryptanalysis expert. The two work as a team as the Vatican's "miracle examiners," traveling the world to investigate the authenticity of claims of miracles.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

title: {'romaji': 'KanColle Movie', 'english': 'KanColle Movie'}
tags: [{'name': 'Ships'}, {'name': 'Military'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'School'}]
description:
The staff at the "Dai-Ni-Kai 'KanColle' Kankanshiki" event in Yokohama in August 2015 announced that the Kantai Collection franchise will get an anime film in 2016. The event screened footage that features the Kan-musume characters Fubuki, Mutsuki, Yuudachi, Akagi and Kaga, Hiryuu Kaini and Souryuu Kaini, the four Kongou sisters (Kaini), Kitakami and Ooi, Choukai Kaini, Yuubari, Mutsu and Nagato, Kako Kaini and Furutaka Kaini, Zuikaku and Shoukaku, Shimakaze, Kuma, and Ouyodo.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Dragonaut: The Resonance', 'english': 'Dragonaut -THE RESONANCE-'}
tags: [{'name': 'Aliens'}, {'name': 'Dragons'}, {'name': 'Super Robot'}]
description:
Twenty years prior to the story's beginning, an asteroid headed for Earth destroys Pluto. Due to Pluto's destruction, the asteroid, which is dubbed Thanatos, becomes temporarily stagnant. Now, in order to avoid Earth's impending destruction, the International Solarsystem Development Agency (ISDA) works on the "D-Project", and creates the "Dragonaut" after finding a dragon egg under the ocean. This weapon's primary purpose is to destroy the asteroid when the time comes. However, they soon find out that the asteroid is not their only threat, as powerful dragon-like creatures, which are bent on destruction, appear on Earth.

After witnessing a murder by one of the creatures, Jin Kamishina, a lonely 18-year-old boy who lost his family in a shuttle accident two years ago, gets involved in the mysteries of the dragons and becomes the chosen pilot of the Dragonaut. Helping him on his journey is Toa, a mysterious girl who saves him from falling to his death after the creature attacks him. As they get deeper into the mysteries of the dragons, they encounter new friends and enemies, and also begin to develop a closer relationship.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: {'romaji': 'Nanatsu no Taizai: Ensa no Edinburgh - Zenpen', 'english': 'The Seven Deadly Sins: Grudge of Edinburgh Part 1'}
tags: [{'name': 'Full CGI'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Super Power'}, {'name': 'Demons'}, {'name': 'Magic'}, {'name': 'Fairy'}, {'name': 'Swordplay'}]
description:
14 years since the Kingdom of Liones defeated the Demon Clan and brought peace to the land, Prince Tristan is tormented by his inability to control two great powers: the Demon Clan power of his father, Meliodas, who served as captain of the Seven Deadly Sins as the Dragon Sin of Wrath, and the Goddess Clan power of his mother, Elizabeth. When Elizabeth’s life is threatened, Tristan flees the kingdom and heads toward Edinburgh, where Deathpierce — who was once a member of group of the kingdom’s Holy Knights, the Pleiades of the Azure Sky — maintains his castle. But what are Deathpierce’s intentions?

The wheel of fate begins to move and sweeps up even The Seven Deadly Sins…

(Source: Netflix)

title: {'romaji': 'Digimon Adventure: LAST EVOLUTION Kizuna', 'english': 'Digimon Adventure: Last Evolution Kizuna'}
tags: [{'name': 'Ensemble Cast'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'College'}, {'name': 'Artificial Intelligence'}, {'name': 'Coming of Age'}, {'name': 'Kaiju'}, {'name': 'Memory Manipulation'}, {'name': 'Urban'}, {'name': 'Virtual World'}, {'name': 'Henshin'}, {'name': 'Anthropomorphism'}, {'name': 'Conspiracy'}, {'name': 'Philosophy'}, {'name': 'Software Development'}]
description:
Tai is now a university student, living alone, working hard at school, and working every day, but with his future still undecided. Meanwhile, Matt and others continue to work on Digimon incidents and activities that help people with their partner Digimon. When an unprecedented phenomenon occurs, the DigiDestined discover that when they grow up, their relationship with their partner Digimon will come closer to an end.

As a countdown timer activates on the Digivice, they realize that the more they fight with their partner Digimon, the faster their bond breaks. Will they fight for others and lose their partner? The time to choose and decide is approaching fast. There is a short time before “chosen children” will become adults. This is the last adventure of Tai and Agumon.

(Source: Fathom Events)

title: {'romaji': 'Toaru Majutsu no Index Specials', 'english': 'A Certain Magical Index Specials '}
tags: [{'name': 'Parody'}, {'name': 'Chibi'}, {'name': 'Kuudere'}]
description: A series of shorts featuring Index-tan.

title: {'romaji': 'Hakuouki Hekketsuroku', 'english': 'Hakuoki ~Demon of the Fleeting Blossom~ Record of the Jade Blood'}
tags: [{'name': 'Historical'}, {'name': 'Swordplay'}, {'name': 'Samurai'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}]
description:
The continuation of Hakuoki.

The Edo Era has ended after 260 years of history and the Meiji Era begins. However, bitter strife still continues between the soldiers of the new government and former Tokugawa retainers. This is the stage in which the surviving members of the Shinsengumi find themselves upon their return to Edo following their defeat at Tobafushimi.

(Sources: ANN, AniDB)

title: {'romaji': "Lance N' Masques", 'english': "Lance N' Masques"}
tags: [{'name': 'Chuunibyou'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Superhero'}]
description:
Yotaro Hanafusa is a descendent of the “Knights of the World.” With the Knight’s Code of Chivalry hammered into him since childhood, Yotaro cannot stop himself from saving damsels in distress. He wears a mask, and is known on the street as “Knight Lancer” but he has always kept his identity a secret. While on an outing, Yotaro saves a 6-year-old girl, Makio Kidoin, the only child of a powerful business tycoon. When Yotaro discovers that Makio leads a lonely life in a huge estate, he resolves to protect her. He and his friends disguise themselves as lodgers and move into her mansion.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru', 'english': 'Otoboku: Maidens are Falling for Me'}
tags: [{'name': 'Ghost'}, {'name': 'Parody'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Ojou-sama'}, {'name': 'Crossdressing'}, {'name': 'School'}, {'name': 'Female Harem'}, {'name': 'Femboy'}, {'name': 'Kuudere'}]
description:
Mizuho can't believe his ears when Grandpa's will is read out. Grandpa's final wish is for Mizuho to attend the same academy as Mizuho's mother. The catch is it's an all-girls school. With the help of friend Mariya however, he gets a makeover good enough to fool everyone at the academy.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Alice or Alice: Siscon Niisan to Futago no Imouto', 'english': 'Alice or Alice'}
tags: [{'name': 'Chibi'}, {'name': 'Cute Girls Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Twins'}, {'name': 'Shounen'}, {'name': 'Nekomimi'}]
description:
What happens when a big brother idolizes his little twin sisters? All sorts of mischief that’s what! Meet Rise and Airi, twin sisters who love to hang out with their friends, go to cute pastry shops and annoy their big brother. Watch as these adorable pint-size girls learn to navigate through life while making sure their brother doesn’t go too over the top.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

title: {'romaji': 'Nora to Oujo to Noraneko Heart', 'english': 'Nora, Princess, and Stray cat.'}
tags: [{'name': 'Parody'}, {'name': 'Chibi'}, {'name': 'Episodic'}, {'name': 'Surreal Comedy'}, {'name': 'Animals'}, {'name': 'Demons'}, {'name': 'Skeleton'}]
description:
One day, on the way to school, Nora meets a girl in the park named Patricia. She states that she is a princess of the underworld, come to the surface to destroy all life. However the first time she touches someone in the surface, she faints, and Nora finds himself nursing her. Patricia asks Nora to tell him the secrets of life, and Nora starts by explaining the adult magazine that they found in the park.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

title: {'romaji': 'Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke wo: Anata to Koibito Tsunagi', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Yuri'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Cute Girls Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'LGBTQ+ Themes'}, {'name': 'Tsundere'}, {'name': 'Scissoring'}, {'name': 'Cunnilingus'}, {'name': 'Flat Chest'}, {'name': 'School'}]
description:
My name is Sawaguchi Mai. I always get myself involved with my classmate, Kawamura Reo.
Reo is pretty short and has silky hair... In short, she's cute. But sometimes, she can be really obstinate.
I'm trying to do my best to get her to get along with the rest of the class, but since we're both headstrong we always end up fighting.
It's so frustrating, especially since she can't do anything without me around!

But whenever I talk to her, Reo always acts like I'm bothering her. I wonder if she hates me...
But then, just when I got all depressed Reo came up to me and told me,
"You've got it all wrong! I love you, Mai! I love you so much!"
Her confession completely took me by surprise. Could it be that I'm in love with Reo too!?

(Source: dlsite.com)

title: {'romaji': 'Kemurikusa', 'english': 'kemurikusa.'}
tags: [{'name': 'Survival'}, {'name': 'Lost Civilization'}, {'name': 'Amnesia'}, {'name': 'Post-Apocalyptic'}, {'name': 'Full CGI'}, {'name': 'Tsundere'}, {'name': 'Robots'}, {'name': 'Aliens'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Dissociative Identities'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Nekomimi'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'Memory Manipulation'}]
description:
The science-fiction action story follows girls who fight with weird entities nicknamed "mushi" (bugs) and survive in a world of red fog.

(Source: Anime News Network) Based on Tatsuki's winning entry from the '24th 3D Anime Contest' in 2012 of the same name.

title: {'romaji': 'Pon no Michi', 'english': 'Pon no Michi'}
tags: [{'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Mahjong'}, {'name': 'Cute Girls Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Food'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Teen Cast'}, {'name': 'Advertisement'}, {'name': 'CGI'}]
description:
The anime is set in Hiroshima Prefecture's Onomichi City, where a high school student Nashiko Jippensha was kicked out of her house. Without a place to play with her friends, she learns that the mahjong parlor that her father used to run is now vacant. She fixes the mahjong parlor and turns it into a place where she and her friends can have fun, cook, have tea, and sometimes play mahjong.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Senritsu no Mirage Pokémon', 'english': 'Pokémon: The Mastermind of Mirage Pokémon'}
tags: [{'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Animals'}, {'name': 'Kids'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Kuudere'}, {'name': 'Primarily Child Cast'}]
description:
Dr. Yung, an enigmatic Pokémon scientist, has developed a new Mirage system that uses computer data to resurrect extinct Pokémon, like Kabutops and Armaldo. Professor Oak, Ash and his companions show up at the Mirage Mansion at Dr. Yung's invitation, and watch a demonstration of the machine's capabilities. In the middle of a battle between Dr. Yung's Mirage Pokémon and Ash, the machine goes haywire and a Mirage Aerodactyl swoops in and kidnaps Dr. Yung. A man calling himself "The Mirage Master" appears and announces to everyone that the Mirage System can be used to create Pokémon with absolutely no weaknesses. Ash, Misty, and Professor Oak struggle to stop the madman and escape with their lives.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Wakako-zake', 'english': 'Wakakozake'}
tags: [{'name': 'Food'}, {'name': 'Episodic'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Seinen'}, {'name': 'Iyashikei'}, {'name': 'Primarily Adult Cast'}, {'name': 'Bar'}, {'name': 'Office Lady'}]
description:
Murasaki Wakako is a 26-year-old OL that loves nothing more than delicious food and drink. Wakako's favorite thing to do for relaxation is to go off by herself after work and go to various places to eat and drink, even if she's never been there before. The moment Wakako is able to taste the pairing between the food she wants to eat and the perfect accompanying drink, the happy sound of "Pshuuu" leaves her lips. Now, then. Where shall we drink tonight?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title: {'romaji': 'STAND BY ME Doraemon', 'english': 'STAND BY ME Doraemon'}
tags: [{'name': 'Kids'}, {'name': 'Full CGI'}, {'name': 'Robots'}, {'name': 'Coming of Age'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Child Cast'}, {'name': 'Time Manipulation'}, {'name': 'Love Triangle'}, {'name': 'School'}]
description: The robotic cat was sent by a boy in the future to the present day to help the boy's hapless grandfather, Nobita. Doraemon, Nobita, and other children deal with everyday childhood issues, solve (and cause) problems with the gadgets in Doraemon's fourth-dimensional pocket, and embark on escapades through time and space.

title: {'romaji': 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor ON TELEVISION', 'english': 'Patlabor the Mobile Police'}
tags: [{'name': 'Police'}, {'name': 'Work'}, {'name': 'Episodic'}, {'name': 'Real Robot'}, {'name': 'Crime'}, {'name': 'Primarily Adult Cast'}, {'name': 'Ensemble Cast'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}]
description:
In the future, advanced robotics has created heavy robots ("labors") for use in a variety of functions: construction, fire-fighting, military, and more. However, though the robots are only machines, their operators are also only human - and humans sometimes turn to crime. Since a heavy labor unit can be a dangerous weapon, the police of the future are set to fight fire with fire, using advanced patrol labor units, "patlabors". This is the story of the Second Special Vehicles Division, a motley crew of patlabor policemen and -women doing their best to fight crime and live a normal life.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Hetalia: The Beautiful World', 'english': 'Hetalia: The Beautiful World'}
tags: [{'name': 'Parody'}, {'name': 'Cute Boys Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Primarily Male Cast'}, {'name': 'Historical'}, {'name': 'Educational'}, {'name': 'Anthropomorphism'}]
description:
The fifth season of Hetalia.

They said it couldn’t happen, but they were as wrong as a stack of pancakes in a cage full of bears! The adorable boys of Hetalia are back with some new friends and a super sparkly new look.

What’s more fun than Germany squatting in a dandelion patch? How about the Axis Boys joining the witchcraft club? Or maybe Russia suffering through a traumatic hamster flashback? Any way you slice the spaghetti, every cute boy enjoys a little quality bath time, and Turkey and Greece can’t wait to start splishing and splashing! Fall in love with this new and improved, sparklelicious season of Hetalia as Belgium throws a mouthwatering waffle party, and America shows off his sweet dance moves! We swear you won’t be disappointed – even when Santa Claus goes missing and Canada (who’s that?) tries to replace him with a polar bear! A POLAR BEAR!? Hetalia, you so cray cray. We’ve missed the squee outta ya!

(Source: Funimation)

title: {'romaji': 'Kidou Senshi Gundam III: Meguriai Sora-hen', 'english': 'Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space'}
tags: [{'name': 'War'}, {'name': 'Military'}, {'name': 'Space'}, {'name': 'Space Opera'}, {'name': 'Real Robot'}, {'name': 'Ensemble Cast'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'Politics'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}]
description:
The One Year War comes to a close, as the Zeon forces now retreat back into space. Amuro learns much more about his Newtype abilities and tries to use them the best way he can. He's pushed to his limit as he encounters the infamous Char Aznable once again. He also falls in love with a mysterious woman named Lalah Sune, who knows the full potential of the Newtype abilities.

The greatest battle is about to begin, as many loved ones fall to the power of war. Can the Earth Federation defeat the Principality of Zeon? Can Char prove that he's a better Newtype than Amuro? All these questions will be answered now...

(Source: Otakufreakmk2)

title: {'romaji': 'xxxHOLiC Rou', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Seinen'}, {'name': 'Youkai'}, {'name': 'Urban Fantasy'}, {'name': 'Primarily Adult Cast'}, {'name': 'Magic'}, {'name': 'Food'}, {'name': 'Twins'}]
description:
10 years after the events of xxxHOLiC Shunmuki, a melancholic Kimihiro Watanuki has taken over the shop formerly run by the mysterious Yuuko due to a promise he made to her. His companions Maru, Moro, and Mokona live together with him in relative contentment, and some familiar faces arrive every now and then: former rival turned-steadfast friend Shizuka Doumeki, and the former psychic prodigy Kohane Tsuyuri. While Kohane studies folklore under Doumeki at university, they encounter a case that is perfect for the master of the shop.

Eventually, Watanuki receives a visit from Doumeki's grandfather, Haruka. He requests that Watanuki investigates his grandson's dreams. While inside the dream world, he discovers how their past adventures played out from Doumeki's perspective of view, leading Watanuki to discover truths from 10 years ago and secrets about the ties that bind their friendship.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

title: {'romaji': 'Anime de Wakaru Shinryounaika', 'english': 'Comical Psychosomatic Medicine'}
tags: [{'name': 'Educational'}, {'name': 'Seinen'}, {'name': 'Slapstick'}, {'name': 'Medicine'}, {'name': 'Work'}, {'name': 'Meta'}, {'name': 'Parody'}]
description: The psychologist Ryou and his cheerful nurse Asuna explain many aspects of mental illness to the reader. They cover topics such as the validity, prevalence, and origins of mental disorders, in addition to addressing specific disorders. The information is imparted in a cheerful and comic manner, with various jokes, puns, and pop culture references.

title: {'romaji': 'NARUTO×UT', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Ninja'}, {'name': 'Shounen'}, {'name': 'Super Power'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}]
description:
UNIQLO clothing stores throughout Japan will be offering a Naruto x UT Original DVD with all-new animation on January 1. The DVD will contain an original Naruto anime video set to an exclusive version of Mayonaka no Orchestra, the upcoming song by the Japanese rock band Aqua Timez. A limited number of the DVDs will be offered as presents to people who buy UNIQLO's Naruto graphic T-shirts online or in stores.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Kimi ni Todoke 2nd Season Specials', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Chibi'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Female Cast'}, {'name': 'Acting'}, {'name': 'Shoujo'}, {'name': 'Fairy Tale'}]
description:
DVD and BD-Box original animation shorts.

Episodes 1 and 2 (DVD and BD) are short fairy tales of Cinderella and Snow White from Kurumi's telling, respectively.

Episode 3 (BD only) is a stage performance of Romeo and Juliet by Kazehaya and Sawako with Chizuru, Ayane, Ryuu in the backstage and Miura as the announcer.

title: {'romaji': 'Taifuu no Noruda', 'english': 'Typhoon Noruda'}
tags: [{'name': 'School'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Aliens'}, {'name': 'Baseball'}, {'name': 'Primarily Child Cast'}, {'name': 'Natural Disaster'}, {'name': 'Rural'}, {'name': 'CGI'}, {'name': 'Nudity'}]
description:
The film takes place on a certain isolated island, at a certain middle school, on the eve of the culture festival. A boy quits baseball after playing his whole life, and has a fight with his best friend. Then they suddenly meet a mysterious, red-eyed girl named Noruda, and a huge typhoon hits the middle school.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Kuroko no Basket: Oshaberi Shiyokka', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'School'}, {'name': 'Shounen'}, {'name': 'Basketball'}]
description: A special episode from the official DVD fandisc.

title: {'romaji': 'Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Arata Naru Tatakai no Overture', 'english': 'Legend of the Galactic Heroes: Overture to a New War'}
tags: [{'name': 'Space Opera'}, {'name': 'Military'}, {'name': 'Space'}, {'name': 'Primarily Adult Cast'}, {'name': 'Politics'}, {'name': 'War'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Tragedy'}, {'name': 'Ensemble Cast'}, {'name': 'Love Triangle'}, {'name': 'Adoption'}, {'name': 'Heterosexual'}, {'name': 'Gore'}]
description:
Led by Reinhard von Müsel, the Galactic Empire crushes the Free Planets Alliance in the Fourth Battle of Tiamat. Arriving in the Imperial capital of Odin to a hero's welcome, Reinhard's victory earns him a promotion to High Admiral and the distinguished title of Count von Lohengramm. On the other side, Yang Wen-li safely returns to the Alliance capital of Heinessen without fanfare and reunites with his dear friends.

Reinhard and Yang look forward to a long-awaited reprieve. However, at the request of the scheming Duke Otho von Braunschweig, the Imperial High Command orders the new High Admiral to invade the Alliance with a fleet of twenty thousand ships. After the Duke leaks the plan to the Alliance government, three fleets totalling forty thousand ships are sent to counter the incoming attack and recreate the famous Battle of Dagon. But even though Reinhard is outnumbered two to one, he has an ingenious plan—and Yang sees right through it. Will Yang's superiors heed his warning before it is too late?

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

title: {'romaji': 'Mugen no Ryvius', 'english': 'Infinite Ryvius'}
tags: [{'name': 'Space'}, {'name': 'Survival'}, {'name': 'Ensemble Cast'}, {'name': 'Real Robot'}, {'name': 'Primarily Child Cast'}, {'name': 'Military'}, {'name': 'Yandere'}, {'name': 'Rape'}, {'name': 'Tsundere'}, {'name': 'Primarily Teen Cast'}, {'name': 'Denpa'}]
description: The year is AD 2225. Kouji Aiba and Aoi Housen are serving as astronauts in-training in Liebe Delta which is located on the edge of the Geduld Sea. When saboteurs with unknown intents suddenly strike during a routine dive procedure, the space station plummets into the Geduld, a plasma field that links all the planets like a nervous system and crushes any ship that strays too far into it. With all the adults onboard killed, the young astronauts will have to survive this long journey home in midst of the growing tension amongst each other. Meanwhile the organizers of the sabotage look on and prepare to attack once more.

title: {'romaji': 'Slayers NEXT', 'english': 'The Slayers Next'}
tags: [{'name': 'Demons'}, {'name': 'Magic'}, {'name': 'Anthropomorphism'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Anti-Hero'}, {'name': 'Gods'}, {'name': 'Dragons'}, {'name': 'Swordplay'}, {'name': 'Crossdressing'}, {'name': 'Shrine Maiden'}, {'name': 'Parody'}]
description:
Let the forces of evil tremble in fear (along with wealthy merchants and innocent bystanders)... THE SLAYERS ARE BACK! Join the not-so-heroic adventures of Lina Inverse--the super-cute sorceress who steals from the rich and keeps it for herself! Along with her sword-swinging (but dumber than dirt) sidekick, Gourry, her hyper-enthusiastic protégé, Amelia, and the tormented and overly-serious golem, Zelgadis, there's nothing Lina can't do!

(Source: Software Sculptors)

title: {'romaji': 'Oruchuban Ebichu', 'english': None}
tags: [{'name': 'Episodic'}, {'name': 'Nudity'}, {'name': 'Surreal Comedy'}, {'name': 'Seinen'}, {'name': 'Animals'}, {'name': 'Slapstick'}, {'name': 'Primarily Adult Cast'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Office Lady'}, {'name': 'Mahjong'}, {'name': 'Anthropomorphism'}]
description:
Ebichu the hamster seems like the perfect house pet: she cleans, shops, cooks, does laundry, and anything to please her master, known only as "Office Lady" (OL). Unfortunately, OL and her unfaithful boyfriend, combined with Ebichu's uncontrollable exuberance and love for ice cream, often earn her severe and bloody punishment. However, Ebichu doesn't seem to mind the abuse if she achieves her goal of making her beloved master a little bit happier.

(Source: IMDb)

Note: Part of Anime no Ai Awa Awa Hour (アニメ愛のあわあわアワー), three relationship-related comedy series aimed at women that were aired on the same day. Oruchuban Ebichu aired twice a day contrary to the other two series.

title: {'romaji': 'Bonjour♪ Koiaji Pâtisserie', 'english': 'Bonjour♪Sweet Love Patisserie'}
tags: [{'name': 'Food'}, {'name': 'Female Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Male Cast'}, {'name': 'School'}, {'name': 'Male Harem'}, {'name': 'Cute Boys Doing Cute Things'}, {'name': 'Age Gap'}]
description: An adaptation of the game with the same name has been announced. The original story follows Sayuri Haruno, a girl who attends an elite confectionery school Fleurir on a scholarship to follow her dream to open a pastry shop. There she meets several charming young men.

description:
Three high school girls are putting together a limited-time shop called "PARK" in Japan's Harajuku. One day, aliens come to Earth with the intent to steal the famed district's culture. At the same time, a mysterious girl appears. The three girls band together to defeat the alien threat and protect their beloved Harajuku.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: {'romaji': 'Cardfight!! Vanguard', 'english': 'Cardfight Vanguard'}
tags: [{'name': 'Card Battle'}, {'name': 'Male Protagonist'}, {'name': 'Primarily Teen Cast'}, {'name': 'Super Power'}, {'name': 'Demons'}, {'name': 'Episodic'}, {'name': 'Dragons'}]
description:
The protagonist of this story, Sendo Aichi, is a timid boy in his third year of middle school. He had been living his life looking backward rather than forward, trying not to stand out. However, he had one thing that kept him going - the "Blaster Blade," a card from a card game that was given to him when he was little. That card is the reason why he begins to engage in Card Fights, something that changes his life drastically.

The name of the card game is "Vanguard." The game takes place in a different planet called "Cray," and due to a never before seen play system, it becomes popular throughout the world.

Aichi, immediately attracted by Vanguard, meets friends such as Tokura Misaki and Katsuragi Kamui, along with other rivals. Through friendly rivalry with them, Aichi begins to enjoy a fulfilling life. Aichi, however, has a goal: to once again battle with a Vanguard Fighter by the name of Kai Toshiki. Kai Toshiki is an aloof and cold-hearted high schooler who has outstanding abilities in the world of Vanguard. He is also the reason why Aichi started playing the game. For him, Toshiki is the person who saved him from his boring life and introduced him to Vanguard. In order to get better at Vanguard, Aichi puts his soul into it every day. He wishes that someday, he'll be able to battle Toshiki and have him recognize his worth.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
